articles.title: Indonesia pauses distribution of a batch of AstraZeneca vaccine - DTNext
articles.description: The batch consists of 448,480 vaccine doses that arrived in the southeast Asian nation last month, part of a delivery of more than 3.85 million doses.
articles.content: The batch consists of 448,480 vaccine doses that arrived in the southeast Asian nation last month, part of a delivery of more than 3.85 million doses.
